item.title: Tom Petty - Free Fallin' - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Free Fallin’ on the baritone ukulele by Tom Petty. The chords used are G C D.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Tom Petty - Free Fallin' - Key of G
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Free Fallin’ on the ukulele by Tom Petty. The chords used are G C D. (Original in F)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Tom Petty - I Won't Back Down - Key of G
